resources.string: Phonebuy is a mobile app developed with Android technology.
• Android version V2.3 or higher. \n• Install app Barcode Scanner ZXing Team.

Phonebuy used for shopping, preparing a shopping list, which can be modified and after the purchase can display an overview. 

• Make shopping list. 
• View your purchase history. 
• Manage shopping cart. 
• View shopping list.

1 - Create shopping list (optional). 2 - Load cart is a section, is to use the barcode reader the app to register the product and its price finally loaded. 3 - In the same section is loaded cart can display the list of products and terminate the load and see a summary of your purchase.
